meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Erika Myers Jacob Silverman Cindy Vanderbur Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6363.

td.p: Erika Myers, a therapist and academic coach from Asheville, North Carolina
Jacob Silverman, an arts and culture journalist from Brooklyn, New York
Cindy Vanderbur, a health insurance contract specialist from Madison, Indiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $54,800)

tr.td: CITY SEALS (& SEA LIONS)
COCKNEY RHYMING SLANG
ORGANIZATIONS
JOHN GRISHAM TITLES
"BEAN" THERE
DUNN THAT
